sourceOrganization.name: NIAID CRSTAL-ID program
sourceOrganization.description: The CRSTAL-ID program, formerly known as the Structural Genomics Centers, supports the characterization of the 3D structure of proteins of infectious disease pathogens. Each Center is a collaborative effort consisting of teams from multiple academic institutions/companies. For more information, visit the NIAID program page: https://www.niaid.nih.gov/research/crstal-id
alternateName: Centers for Research on Structural Biology of Infectious Diseases
